Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <unk19:D0FF1FC80CE00C80>
Entry.EnglishText: <unk19:D0FF1FC80CE00C80>

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場・密林化
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory - Jungle

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場・密林化
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory - Jungle

Entry.JapaneseText: 氷も溶かしちゃうなんて、 すごい生命力！
Entry.EnglishText: The flower was even able to melt the ice! It's got crazy durability.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、凍ってる間は この大きな花の活動は 完全に停止していたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: But it was completely unable to do anything while it was frozen.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>デバッグ機能で 大きな花を燃やす？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>Burn the flower using debug powers? Ye No

Entry.JapaneseText: 今だ!! 一気に行くぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Now's our chance!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああっ、燃えたと思ったのに 元に戻っちゃったよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, just when I thought I toasted it, it came back to life!

Entry.JapaneseText: あの巨大な花が叫ぶのと……
Entry.EnglishText: This flower was revived...

Entry.JapaneseText: この花が復活したのは同時だった。
Entry.EnglishText: ...at the same time the large flower cried out.

Entry.JapaneseText: この花を無力化するには 大元を叩くしかないようだな。
Entry.EnglishText: We'll have to deal with the big one first if we want to take out this one.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今だ!! 一気に行くぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Now's our chance!

Entry.JapaneseText: ダメだ…… この花は焼き払えないよ。 他の方法を考えないと！
Entry.EnglishText: It won't work... This flower just won't burn. We need to think of some other way to deal with it!

Entry.JapaneseText: この花、すごい生命力だヨ!! 氷が溶けたら元に戻っちゃった。
Entry.EnglishText: This flower sure is resilient! It's back to normal after having been frozen.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>のフォルスではだめか……
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>'s Force isn't going to work...

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクの炎じゃダメみたい。 他の方法を考えなきゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: My Fire isn't going to work here. We need to think of something else...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっかいな花だな。
Entry.EnglishText: This flower is bothersome.

Entry.JapaneseText: この花をなんとかしないと、 先に進めないみたいですね。
Entry.EnglishText: If we don't do something about this flower, then we won't be able to proceed.

Entry.JapaneseText: この花をなんとかしないと いけないんだよな……
Entry.EnglishText: We gotta do something about this flower...

Entry.JapaneseText: めんどくさい花ね。
Entry.EnglishText: This flower is annoying.

Entry.JapaneseText: この花をどうにかしなければ……
Entry.EnglishText: We need to do something about this flower...

Entry.JapaneseText: あの花、元に戻っちゃってる！
Entry.EnglishText: The flower thawed out!
Entry.Notes: sorry this is not literal gang

Entry.JapaneseText: あの花が凍っている間に 隣の部屋まで移動するのは無理だ。 フォルスでなんとかできないのか……
Entry.EnglishText: We don't have the time to reach the next room while the flower is frozen. Perhaps there is something we can do with our Forces...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>の<Yellow>炎<White>は通用しなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>'s <Yellow>Fire<White> didn't work...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、他の花は焼き払えたんです。 フォルスの炎よりも高い温度の 火力があれば、燃えるかも……
Entry.EnglishText: But we were able to burn the other flowers. Perhaps if we had fire that was hotter than <Mao>'s Force, we would be able to burn it.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなものがどこに……
Entry.EnglishText: Where could we find that...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここに溶鉱炉があるんだから、 どこかに燃やす材料があるはず！ それを使えば？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, since there's a blast furnace here, there's gotta be some combustable fuel around! Maybe we could use that?

Entry.JapaneseText: いい考えだ。探そう。
Entry.EnglishText: That's a good idea. Let's look for some.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの花が凍っている間に ここまで移動するのは無理だ。 フォルスでなんとか できればいいのだが……
Entry.EnglishText: We can only go so far while that flower is frozen. If only there was something we could do about it with our Forces...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>の<Yellow>炎<White>は通用しなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>'s <Yellow>Fire<White> didn't work...

Entry.JapaneseText: どんなものでも燃やすような <Yellow>すごい火力<White>があれば……
Entry.EnglishText: We could make anything combust if we had something capable of generating <Yellow>intense fire<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 柵が閉まっている……
Entry.EnglishText: The grating is shut...

Entry.JapaneseText: 柵が閉まってるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The grating is shut.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄柵が閉まっているな。
Entry.EnglishText: The steel fence is closed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄の柵が閉まってますね。
Entry.EnglishText: The iron grating is closed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄の柵が閉まっているな。
Entry.EnglishText: The iron grating is closed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄の柵が閉まっているわ。
Entry.EnglishText: The iron grating is closed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄の柵が閉まっている。
Entry.EnglishText: The iron grating is closed.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここから石炭をいれたとしても 強い火力にはなりそうもないな……
Entry.EnglishText: We won't be able to create a large fire if we use the coal here...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここから石炭を入れても バラバラになるから、 強い火にはならないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If we use the coal here, it'll scatter about and we won't be able to create a strong fire.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここから石炭を入れても 火力が分散して、あまり 有効ではないな……
Entry.EnglishText: Using the coal here would disperse it and make any resulting fire ineffective...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここから石炭を入れても バラバラになってしまうので、 強い火力は期待できませんね。
Entry.EnglishText: If we were to use the coal here, it wouldn't be concentrated enough to generate a strong fire.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここから石炭を入れても あまり有効ではないな……
Entry.EnglishText: If we used the coal here, it wouldn't be very effective.

Entry.JapaneseText: しばらくおとなしくしていろ。
Entry.EnglishText: Behave yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: ダメだ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's not working...

Entry.JapaneseText: 炎がだめなら、こうするまでだ。
Entry.EnglishText: If fire isn't working, then let's try this.

Entry.JapaneseText: しばらくおとなしくしていろ。
Entry.EnglishText: Behave yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: 花は凍っている……
Entry.EnglishText: The flower is frozen...

Entry.JapaneseText: 花は凍ってるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The flower's frozen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 花は凍っているな。
Entry.EnglishText: The flower is frozen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 花は凍っていますね。
Entry.EnglishText: The flower is frozen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 花は凍ってるぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: The flower is frozen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 花は凍ってるわね。
Entry.EnglishText: The flower is frozen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 花が凍っている。
Entry.EnglishText: The flower is frozen.

Entry.JapaneseText: この花の生命力が 弱っている間ならもしかして……
Entry.EnglishText: We might be able to get through while the flower is weak...

Entry.JapaneseText: この花の生命力が 弱っている間ならたぶん……
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe we could get through while the flower is weakened...

Entry.JapaneseText: この花の生命力が 弱っている間ならもしや……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps we will be able to proceed while this flower is weakened.

Entry.JapaneseText: この花の生命力が 弱っている間ならきっと……
Entry.EnglishText: Surely we'll be able to proceed while this flower is weakened...

Entry.JapaneseText: この花の生命力が 弱っている間ならたぶん……
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe we could get through while the flower is weakened...

Entry.JapaneseText: この花の生命力が 弱っている間ならもしかして……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps we can get through while this flower is weakened...

Entry.JapaneseText: この花の生命力が 弱っている間ならもしかして……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps we can get through while this flower is weakened...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっとおとなしくなったか。
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like you finally settled down.

Entry.JapaneseText: 大きな花は溶鉱炉の熱で しおれたみたいだね。
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like the big flower has wilted from the furnace's heat.

Entry.JapaneseText: この花も溶鉱炉の熱には 耐えられなかったようだな。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like this flower couldn't tolerate the heat from the blast furnace.

Entry.JapaneseText: 大きな花は溶鉱炉の熱で しおれたみたいですね。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like this big flower has wilted due to the heat from the blast furnace.

Entry.JapaneseText: この花…… ちょっとかわいそうだな。
Entry.EnglishText: I feel kind sorry for this flower...

Entry.JapaneseText: この花も溶鉱炉の熱には 耐えられなかったみたいね。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like this flower couldn't tolerate the heat from the blast furnace.

Entry.JapaneseText: 大きな花は溶鉱炉の熱で しおれたようだ。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like the big flower has wilted from the furnace's heat.
